function.name: GetWheelCount
function.desc: Returns the number of wheels that are attached to this vehicle.

function.name: GetWheels
function.desc: Returns a table containing all of this vehicle's wheels.

function.name: GetWheel
function.desc: Returns the ''n''th wheel of this vehicle.

function.name: GetWheelDirection
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's default wheel direction.

function.name: GetWheelRadius
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's default wheel radius.

function.name: GetWheelDampingCompression
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's default damping compression.

function.name: GetSpeedKmh
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's speed in kilometers per hour.

function.name: GetMaxEngineForce
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's maximum engine force.

function.name: GetMaxReverseEngineForce
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's maximum reverse engine force.

function.name: GetMaxBrakeForce
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's maximum brake force.

function.name: GetEngineForce
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's current engine force.

function.name: GetBrakeForce
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's current brake force.

function.name: SetEngineForce
function.desc: Changes the vehicle's current engine force.

function.name: SetBrakeForce
function.desc: Changes the vehicle's current brake force.

function.name: GetMaxSuspensionLength
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's default maximum suspension length.

function.name: GetMaxSuspensionCompression
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's default maximum suspension compression.

function.name: GetSuspensionStiffness
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's default suspension stiffness.

function.name: GetFrictionSlip
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's default friction slip.

function.name: GetRollInfluence
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's default roll influence.

function.name: GetAcceleration
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's acceleration.

function.name: GetTurnSpeed
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's turn speed.

function.name: GetMaxTurnAngle
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's max turn angle.

function.name: GetSteeringWheel
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's steering wheel.

function.name: GetSteeringAngle
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's current steering angle.

function.name: HasDriver
function.desc: Returns ''true'', if the vehicle has a driver.

function.name: GetDriver
function.desc: Returns the vehicle's driver.

function.name: ClearDriver
function.desc: Forces the vehicle's driver to exit the vehicle.

function.name: AddWheel
function.desc: Add a new wheel to the vehicle.

function.name: SetWheelDirection
function.desc: Changes the direction of all of the vehicle's wheels.

function.name: SetWheelRadius
function.desc: Changes the wheel radius of all wheels.

function.name: SetMaxSuspensionLength
function.desc: Changes the maximum suspension length for all wheels.

function.name: SetMaxSuspensionCompression
function.desc: Changes the maximum suspension compression for all wheels.

function.name: SetSuspensionStiffness
function.desc: Changes the suspension stiffness of all wheels.

function.name: SetWheelDampingCompression
function.desc: Changes the damping compression of all wheels.

function.name: SetFrictionSlip
function.desc: Changes the friction slip of all wheels.

function.name: SetSteeringAngle
function.desc: Changes the vehicle's current steering angle.

function.name: SetRollInfluence
function.desc: Changes the roll influence of all wheels.

function.name: SetMaxEngineForce
function.desc: Changes the vehicle's maximum engine force.

function.name: SetMaxReverseEngineForce
function.desc: Changes the vehicle's maximum reverse engine force.

function.name: SetMaxBrakeForce
function.desc: Changes the vehicle's maximum brake force.

function.name: SetAcceleration
function.desc: Changes the vehicle's acceleration.

function.name: SetTurnSpeed
function.desc: Changes the vehicle's turn speed.

function.name: SetMaxTurnAngle
function.desc: Changes the vehicle's max turn angle.

function.name: SetSteeringWheelModel
function.desc: Changes the vehicle's steering wheel model. The steering wheel will be attached to the "steering_wheel" attachment of the chassis.

function.name: IsFirstPersonCameraEnabled
function.desc: Returns ''true'' if the first-person camera is enabled for this vehicle.

function.name: SetFirstPersonCameraEnabled
function.desc: Enables or disables the first-person camera for the vehicle.

function.name: IsThirdPersonCameraEnabled
function.desc: Returns ''true'' if the third-person camera is enabled for this vehicle.

function.name: SetThirdPersonCameraEnabled
function.desc: Enables or disables the third-person camera for the vehicle.
